goals__remit: Nexter is an European Leader in the domain of Defence Land systems and supports armed and security forces by providing them means to fullfil their needs. The company is oriented towards innovation, R&D, design and realisation of complex systems, preparation of futur equipment and international cooperation. In the scope of its activities, Nexter pays special attention to the respect of ethical, social and economical responsibilities.
position: Head of EU and NATO Affairs
